name: Nyarlathotep
skill: Deals 1258/1498 DMG to all enemies, with moderate chance of inflicting Stun.
ability: Normal attacks have a significant chance of inflicting Silence.

additional_data.description: A spirit with many forms who leads people into chaos and madness. She has multiple personalities, and can switch between them at will. When helping with assignments, she uses whichever personality suits the situation, but it's hard for her to switch when she's emotionally overwrought. When in the victim's role, she's been known to snap and go off on violent rampages. Recently, however, she has repented of this behavior and tries to make up for it by throwing herself into her work. Surely, Santa Claus will reward her?
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Clear Chapter 5
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Exchange for 5000 Tiny Present
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Tiny Present during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.

summon: "I want to help! And when we're done with our work, then we can have some fun!"
limit_break: "This feeling... I think a new personality is awakening within me..."
